caption.p:
Comparison of proxies for Jiujiang red earth section with ( a) Î´ 18O records of the equatorial Pacific Core V28-238 (Shackleton and Opdyke, 1973) and ( b) magnetic susceptibility from northern Chinese loess-paleosol sections (an average of data from Luochuan and Xifeng; Kukla et al.
56 ). Ke Yin created this figure using Grapher 9 and CorelDRAW14.
